resources.string: SOS Nigeria is an android emergency app with list of all the major emergency numbers in Nigeria. A lot of Nigerians don\'t know or have these numbers because some are too long to remember. SOS Nigeria makes it easy with just the click of a button. Lets come together and make Nigeria a better place.

SOS Nigeria was developed by 
 ~ Chang Technologies, solving problems via code. ~ 
 ~ changtechnologies@gmail.com ~
